content: उपस्थ {%<ab>a.</ab>%} Near, approximate. --स्थः {@--1@} The lap; उपस्थं कृ to make a lap; °स्थे कृ to take on the lap. {@--2@} The middle part in general. --स्थः स्थं {@--1@} The organ of generation (of men and women, particularly of the latter); स्नानं मौनोपवासेज्यास्वाध्यायोपस्थनिग्रहाः <ls>Y. 3. 314</ls> (male); स्थूलोपस्थस्थलीषु <ls>Bh. 1. 20</ls> (female); हस्तौ पायुरुपस्थश्च <ls>Y. 3. 92</ls> (where the word is used in both senses). {@--2@} The anus. {@--3@} The haunch or hip.
